Back To Recipes

recipe

Ingredients

Dijon Mustard 0.75 cup
Orange Juice 0.25 cup
Olive Oil 2 Tbsp
6 Garlic Cloves 6 unit
Salt 2 tsp
Chicken Thigh 3 pound

239 calories (Orange Juice/Garlic Clove/Salt/Chicken Thigh Data Missing)

1801 sodium (Orange Juice/Garlic Clove/Salt/Chicken Thigh Data Missing)

2 cost (Orange Juice/Olive Oil/Garlic Clove/Salt/Chicken Thigh Data Missing)

0 sugar (Orange Juice/Olive Oil/Garlic Clove/Salt/Chicken Thigh Data Missing)

0 protein (Orange Juice/Olive Oil/Garlic Clove/Salt/Chicken Thigh Data Missing)

Recipe

Estimated Time: 10 Minutes

Mince the 6 Garlic Cloves
Combine everything but chicken ( ¾ cup Dijon Mustard ¼ cup Orange Juice 2 Tbsp Olive Oil Garlic Clove 2 tsp Salt ) in a bowl and mix
Put in 3 pounds Chicken Thigh and leave marinated for 12 hours
Timer 10 minutes Cook Cook Chicken, flip at 5 min mark in oven @ 500°
